column.name: PRICE_PLAN_VERSION_ID
column.comment: Unique Identifier of a price plan version. This is how the system differentiates price plans which share the same code.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE
column.comment: The date that this price plan version will take effect.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Data warehouse entry last action type: "I"-Inserted, "U"-Updated, "D"-Deleted.

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: PRICE_PLAN_CODE
column.comment: Unique Identifier of a price plan object and all of its related versions

column.name: PROVIDER_CODE
column.comment: The code of the provider that is chosen by the user.

column.name: ROOT_SELECTION_RULE_ID
column.comment: The unique ID of the selection rule that is the root of the Algorithm Selection Rule Set, otherwise known as this price plan. The event sho uld begin traversing the tree of rules at this rule.

column.name: NAME
column.comment: A thirty character window of opportunity for the user to brilliantly capture all the complexities of the price plan in a nutshell.

column.name: SERVICE_INDEPENDENT_INDICATOR
column.comment: Y if this price plan doesn t price any services, and N if it does.

column.name: DESCRIPTIVE_TEXT
column.comment: A field which can store text input by the user. The text should help the user know more about the price plan on a fairly high level, althou gh in fact on a lower level than the name of course.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_STATUS
column.comment: The status on effective_date.

column.name: MAX_SELECTED_DESTINATIONS_VAL
column.comment: A number which represents the maximum number of selected destinations that the user specified.

column.name: BILLING_NAME_1
column.comment: A name that describes the billing entity in English

column.name: BILLING_NAME_2
column.comment: The german equivalent of BILLING_NAME_1.

column.name: MINIMUM_CHARGE_INDICATOR
column.comment: An indicator that is set to Y if there is a calculation with the name Minimum Charge associated to any process step in the price plan .

column.name: SUMMARIZE_INDICATOR
column.comment: An indicator that is set to Y if any of the calculations associated to process steps in the price plan are of type summarize, otherwise it s N

column.name: PLAN_PERIOD_INDICATOR
column.comment: Y if the price plan is multiperiod, N if it is a bill period price plan

column.name: COMMENT_ID
column.comment: The ID of a comment that is entered for the price plan object.

column.name: CONTRIBUTING_ITEM_INDICATOR
column.comment: Y if this price plan is a contributing item price plan (checked on the related services view), N if it is not.

column.name: CUSTOMER_NUMBER
column.comment: The ID of the customer specified for this price plan, if there is one

column.name: DISCONTINUE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: The date at which this price plan is considered discontinued (ie no further subscriptions possible.)

column.name: DISCONTINUE_INDICATOR
column.comment: Y if the plan is discontinued, N if it is not.

column.name: PERIOD_TYPE_RD
column.comment: A positive integer indicating the frequency of the period factor.

column.name: PERIOD_FACTOR
column.comment: Reference data code representing the factor with which a multiperiod price plan will based on, i.e. Month, Day, etc.

column.name: ACCOUNT_DISCOUNT_INDICATOR
column.comment: Y if the plan gives an account level discount, N if it does not.

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: Audit information capturing user id of last update

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: Audit information capturing date and time of last update

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is incremented on each update. Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the

column.name: EFFECTIVE_FLAG
column.comment: Flagging of entries accordigng to EFFECTIVE_DATE maintained by source system (EFFONL). N (now) - currently valid entry, "P" (past) - entry that was vaild somethen in the past, "F" (future) - entrtry will be valid in the future.

column.name: EFFECTIVE_DATE_HW
column.comment: Effective Date HW

column.name: MAX_PREFERRED_COUNTRIES_VAL
column.comment: Max. Preferred Countries Value

column.name: ACTIVATION_INDICATOR
column.comment: Activation Indicator for the Price Plan

column.name: CHANGE_INDICATOR
column.comment: Change Indicator for the Price Plan

column.name: DEACTIVATION_INDICATOR
column.comment: Deactivation Indicator for the Price Plan

column.name: VERSIONING_INDICATOR
column.comment: Versioning Indicator for the Price Plan

column.name: VERSIONING_COMBINE_INDICATOR
column.comment: Versioning Combine Indicator for the Price Plan

column.name: PRICE_DETERMINING_INDICATOR
column.comment: Price Determining Indicator

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
